html: thou shalt call thy walls Salvation, and thy gates Praise. In ancient Israel, the walls and gates of Jerusalem had names. In the New Jerusalem the names of the walls and gates will indicate the reign of Jehovah (Rev. 21:12, 14). Zion will not need walls of stone for protection, for the Lord himself will save her (26:1), and all who enter through the gates will do so for the purpose of praising him (26:1-2). Salvation is God's gift to his people; praise is what they bring in return.
